name: Merge Plus 2:Adventure
description:
Merge Plus 2 is coming NOW!

At this time, we continue to do a basic game play like Merge plus: Drag handcard to the block on the chessboard, then, It will be merged into the Sum of the two numbers. At least 3 same adjacent numbers will complete one merge. 

Meanwhile, hundreds of fantastic levels are waiting for your challenge.

Level Description: 
1. Scores Level: Arrived target scores in limited moves.
2. Numbers Collection: Collected target numbers in limited moves.
3. Ice layer Crush: Crushed ice layer covering on the numbers through once merged.
4. Ice Block Crush: Crushed Ice Block though merging around of the ice block. 

More and more new game play will be updated, Let’s Challenge and Enjoy!
